channel.title: government spending on Hyuna Kwon
channel.description: Recent content in government spending on Hyuna Kwon

item.title: Resolving New Keynesian Anomalies with Wealth in the Utility Function
item.description: This paper resolves all the anomalies of the New Keynesian model at the zero lower bound by introducing wealth into the utility function.

item.title: Optimal Public Expenditure with Inefficient Unemployment
item.description: This paper shows that when unemployment is inefficient, optimal public expenditure deviates from the Samuelson rule to reduce the unemployment gap.

item.title: A Theory of Countercyclical Government Multiplier
item.description: This paper develops a New Keynesian model in which the government multiplier doubles when the unemployment rate rises from 5% to 8%.
